page.title: 05Seed Merchants,Turvey
page.content: Quenby Price,part of United Agricultural Merchants Ltd,<Unilever Group>have been here since 1961.It's operations cover 10 counties administered from here.Major suppliers of animal feeds,fertilizers, agro-chemicals and advice service.For 1986 sales of 67,000 tons of animal feeds,50,000 tons of fertilizer and agro-chemicals worth Â£2.5 million contributing to total turnover of Â£100,000 million.A Seed production plant(wheat,rape,peas,barley,oats, beans)built in 1980.The company pioneered the production of oilseed rape and hs laboratories for germination and quality tests and to assess disease resistance and field characteristics.Grain(275,000 tons)and rape(132,000 tons)handled 1986-cleaned dried and stored in silos.The 4 silos over 90ft high are a local landmark.
